message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I'm proposing a more balanced split, Alice.  Consider the declining value - this offer ensures we both benefit significantly.
Bob, time is money!  Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is it. A 50/50 split is the only fair option remaining.  Any further delays will only hurt us both. Accept this offer, and we both walk away with something substantial.
